text: 1/2 Our tele-town hall, previously scheduled for this evening, Tuesday, February 6, at 6:30 p.m., had to be postponed due to the vote schedule this evening.

Tonight President Donald J. Trump will deliver the State of the Union address to a Joint Session of Congress. I’m looking forward to hearing his vision for the next year in office. Be sure to tune in at 9 p.m. EST to hear the President live. Check your local listings.
2/2 Our debt to the selfless and courageous men and women “in blue,” who risk everything to keep us safe every day, will never be paid.

1/2 My prayers are with our law enforcement involved in the shooting in Hbrg this morning, especially the family of the Fallen U.S. Marshal. I’m incredulous, furious and saddened by this senseless tragedy.

I’ll be on Your World with Neil Cavuto on @FoxNews around 4:10 pm this afternoon. Charles Payne (@cvpayne) is guest hosting and we’ll discuss efforts to ensure that a long-term government funding proposal is enacted before the Friday deadline. I hope you’ll tune in.
Praying for our friends in San Antonio.
Our hearts are grieved, horrified and angered and by the incomprehensible tragedy in Las Vegas. Praying for everyone impacted.
We stand with the people of our friend and ally, Spain, especially upon today's terrorist attack in Barcelona. #PrayersforBarcelona
We must be united against bigotry and hate.
Muslims & others from the more than 190 remaining countries, including more than 40 Muslim-majority countries, are unaffected.  (3/3)
There's no "Muslim ban." @POTUS's order temporarily bans people entering our country from 6 countries rife w/ jihadist violence (2/3).
Very excited to hear that York & Harrisburg were chosen for the 2017 @RiseOfRest bus tour - a national effort to boost entrepreneurship.
2/2 I've decided to postpone our town hall meeting on Saturday.
1/2 In light of Wednesday's attack, continued security concerns, extensive and myriad discussions with law enforcement and other officials
God Bless the brave warriors of the U.S. Capitol Police, who deal with more on a daily basis than most of us can possibly imagine.Thank you.
2/2 I pray whomever perpetrated this - yet another cowardly and senseless act of violence - is brought to judgment. My staff and I are safe.
Our thoughts and prayers are with Congressman Steve Scalise, his family and staff and our fellow Members of Congress.
I just proudly voted for the McSally Amendment which blocks special healthcare benefits for Congress.
I need to hear from you! I’ll be hosting a Facebook Live town meeting at 6:30pm on Wednesday,  February 15 live on my Facebook page.
The #PresidentialInauguration isn't about a person, but of an American process. Never crossed my mind to miss Obama inauguration in 2013.
#Whistleblowers are critical in exposing waste in our gov. I’m proud the House passed H.R. 69 to protect these employees from retaliation.
Today I voted to override President Obama’s veto of #JASTA, allowing families of 9/11 victims to sue the government of Saudi Arabia.
#OnThisDay in 1945, Japan surrendered to the United States, ending World War II. #OTD
FBI Dir. Comey: “evidence of potential violations of the statutes regarding the handling of classified information” by Sec. Clinton.
I added my name as a cosponsor to H.Res.752 which condemns  #YulinDogMeatFestival & urges #China to impose a ban on such practices
About to join @greta on @FoxNews to discuss #terrorism in the aftermath of #BrusselsAttacks
Condolences to Reagan family on learning of Nancy Reagan's passing. I find solace that Pres. Reagan and the First Lady are together again.
#OnThisDay in 1922, the 19th Amdt to the Constitution, providing for female suffrage, unanimously was declared constitutional by SCOTUS #OTD
Here's wishing @GovernorTomWolf a quick recovery. I stand w/ him in encouraging everyone in PA to have reg. dr. visits for early detection
Congrats to one of the best in the business, @greta, on her 3500th show tonight! #greta3500
Saddened to learn of the passing of Justice Scalia. Thoughts & prayers to his family. His loyalty to the Constitution will be sorely missed.
“Abortion is profoundly anti-women. Three quarters of its victims are women: Half the babies and all the mothers.” #MotherTeresa #whywemarch
Disappointed Senate Democrats blocked the #SAFEAct. Americans deserve to know that refugees coming into the US have been properly vetted.
Details of President's #guncontrol #ExecutiveOrder haven’t been released. Be assured I’ll do all I can to uphold the #SecondAmendment.
I'll be joining @greta tonight at 7pm on @FoxNews. Tune in!
Saddened and angered by the horror in #Paris. Thoughts and prayers to victims and loved ones affected by this act of terror. #Prayers4Paris
To those observing Yom Kippur starting at sundown tonight, I wish you an easy and meaningful fast.
As Jewish families celebrate Rosh Hashanah today, I wish them a very happy New Year. L’shanah tovah!
Today, we celebrate the backbone of our country - hardworking Americans. Please enjoy a safe and great #LaborDay.
We ARE...RED LAND!   You guys brought a community and Nation together.  WE. ARE. SO. PROUD.   UNITED STATES CHAMPIONS!!
Amazing win by Red Land Little League Team to win the U.S. Championship. Can't wait for tomorrow's championship against Japan. #WhyNotUs
Angered and heartbroken to learn of the murder of four U.S. Marines during today's attacks in Tennessee. Our prayers are w/ their loved ones
#HappyFathersDay to all the Dads. Though not always easy, being a father is the single most important and rewarding job any man can have.
On this day in 1967, Thurgood Marshall was appointed to the Supreme Court, shattering the color barrier on the Nation’s highest court.
Very concerned about the Miller Chemical fire in Hanover area/Adams County.  Great thanks to the First Responders for their tireless work.
Today in 1865, marked what is generally regard as the end of the Civil War. Our district was uniquely affected by the Battle of Gettysburg.
Hope to see you at the Camp Hill Memorial Day Parade this morning at 9 - starts at 19th and Market Streets.
Opposed the USA Freedom Act becaues it didn't stop the #NSA from collecting Americans’ data. We must protect our Constitutional rights.
Thoughts and prayers for the victims of the #Amtrak derailment, their loved ones, and for the City of #Philadelphia.
Prayers for my fellow aviators and all 11 brothers-in-arms who perished in the recent Black Hawk crash in Florida - Godspeed, Gentlemen.
Happy Birthday to the Boy Scouts of America, an organization that really helps young men realize the value of service & patriotism.
Fed regs cost small biz $11K per employee. We voted to require agencies to disclose true costs of fed. mandates on local govs & small biz.
Despite media reports, the House repealed the ACA 4 times. We've voted on 56 changes & POTUS signed 10 of them. We agree the ACA is flawed.
#TIH, the 2nd Treaty of Paris was ratified ending the Revolutionary War & marked Britain recognizing the independence of our great Nation.
#TDIH, Pres. Lincoln delivered the Gettysburg Address. As Lincoln said we shouldn't forget those that gave the last full measure of devotion
Today in 1863 Pres. Lincoln arrived at the Gettysburg Train Station prior to his Address. I have a bill to permanently preserve this site.
Speaking with @PAManufacturers on #PMAperspective Show on Sunday at 5:30 PM on PCN TV about helping Service Members & Veterans find jobs.
To those observing Yom Kippur starting at sundown tonight, I wish you an easy fast.
The school security event on Saturday at Northern High School in Dillsburg has been cancelled. We’ll update you when it’s re-scheduled.
Joining @MorningBriefing this morning around 7:40 on @SXMPOTUS channel number 124 to talk about my medical marijuana oil bill.

Happy Birthday @SenBobCasey. Hope today is a great one.
Thank you to everyone that attended the town meetings yesterday in Lemoyne and Springettsbury. Your input is critical and invaluable to me.
George Washington said, "The Constitution is the guide which I never will abandon." I couldn't agree more. Happy Presidents' Day.

So why not invest every dollar? Better yet, wouldn't the private sector want to make that kind of investment?
We've heard all this before, numerous times. We need action and leadership, not more politic speeches and blame.
What amount of tax is enough Mr President? It's not only the rich paying more tax. You have all folks paying more, for what? #SOTU
